item.title: [Python] Set VS Code to PyCharm.
[Python] Use AWS interpreter with Pycharm
item.description: ## things to do Develop with local pycharm using AWS instance interpreter! background When it is extremely difficult to install a specific module, it is very easy to use the already installed AWS AMI or docker container. However, I want to do coding with an IDE such as pycharm, so it is a little difficult to enter the server and develop with vim. .. With pycharm, I logged in to the server with remote, I found a function that can be coded using the interpreter of that server, so I tried it and made a note.

item.title: [Python] The strongest Python integrated development environment PyCharm
item.description: # Strongest Python integrated development environment PyCharm When learning a new language, a good IDE will be the best teacher, so I think it should be used actively without being stingy. So, let’s take a look at PyCharm, the most powerful integrated development environment in Python. I think it is the most, so I wrote it assuming Web application development with Django. The data on functions and price system are as of PyCharm 5.

item.title: [Python] pycharm shortcut
item.description: Pycharm Community Edition came out, so I tried using it immediately. On Mac Command+F search Command + R replacement Command+shift+F grep search Command+shift+R grep replacement Command + Option + R execution Command+Option+D Debug execution Command + O class name filter Command+shift+O File name filter
